title: Coinbase-backed Base leads in Ethereum layer-2 fees amid trading activity surge
description:
Coinbase-backed Base has the highest transaction fees among Ethereum layer-2 networks due to the current wave of attention it enjoys among crypto traders. Gasfees data shows that Base is the priciest layer-2 protocol among scaling solutions that have implemented the Dencun Upgrade’s Blobs feature. The feature significantly reduces transaction fees and enhances throughput for layer-2 […]

The post Coinbase-backed Base leads in Ethereum layer-2 fees amid trading activity surge appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BlackRock debuts BUIDL, its first tokenized fund on Ethereum
description: BlackRock has launched its first Ethereum-based tokenized fund, BUIDL, to offer investors secure, tokenized investment opportunities.

title: Standard Chartered’s New BTC Forecast Pushes Investors into Algotech
description: Standard Chartered has captured the attention of the crypto world with its revised predictions, notably increasing its year-end forecast for Bitcoin (BTC) to an impressive $150,000, marking a substantial 50% hike from earlier projections.  The bank also casts a promising light on Ethereum (ETH), anticipating a notable rise in its […]
